gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: rubweIAwx [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: It is them who bless all these creations and natural beauties with grace and elegance. (269)

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: hr ks iz SOik qU kdm Az sr sw^q [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: The Naam of Waaheguru is an ornament for His noble and saintly devotees,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਤੇਰੇ ਸ਼ੌਕ ਕਾਰਣ ਹਰ ਇੱਕ ਸਿਰ ਦੇ ਪੈਰੀਂ ਤੁਰਿਆ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: br nhu qbk cri^ Alm sr A&rw^q [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And, the eye of these nobilities is always full of pearls and gems because of the refulgent glow of the Almighty. (270)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਅਤੇ ਉਸ ਨੇ ਨੌਵਾਣ ਅਸਮਾਨਾਣ ਤੇ ਆਪਣਾ ਝੰਡਾ ਗਡ ਲਿਆ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: Sud AwmdnS mubwirk r&qn hm [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Their words are a lessons for a permanent life,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਉਸ ਦਾ ਆਉਣਾ ਵੀ ਮੁਬਾਰਕ ਹੋਇਆ ਤੇ ਜਾਨਾ ਵੀ ਸੁਭਾਗਾ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: goXw Awx ks ik rwih h¤k rw ibSnw^q [1[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And, the memory of Akaalpurakh abides on their lips/tongue for ever. (271)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਗੋਯਾ, ਜਿਸ ਨੇ ਰੱਬ ਦੇ ਰਾਹ ਨੂੰ ਪਹਿਚਾਨ ਲਿਆ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: kUr Asq hr Awx dIdw ik h¤k rw nBSnw^q [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Their utterances have the status of the words of Divine,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਹਰ ਉਹ ਅੱਖ ਜਿਸ ਨੇ ਰੱਬ ਨੂੰ ਨਾ ਪਛਾਣਿਆ, ਮਾਨੋ ਅੰਨ੍ਹੀ ਹੈ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: eIx aumir igrwx mwXw b-Z&lq drbw^q [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And, not even one breath of theirs is spent without remembering Him. (272)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਉਸ ਨੇ ਇਸ ਕੀਮਤੀ ਆਯੂ ਨੂੰ ਅਣਗਹਿਲੀ ਵਿਚ ਹੀ ਗਵਾ ਦਿੱਤਾ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: aU igrIAwx kunwx Awmd b-hsrq murd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: All these saintly persons are really seekers of a Divine glimpse,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਉਹ ਰੋਣਦਾ ਹੋਇਆ ਆਇਆ ਅਤੇ ਸਧਰਾਣ ਆਪਣੇ ਨਾਲ ਲਈ ਮਰ ਗਿਆ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: A&sos drIx Awmd Sud kwry nBsw^q [2[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And, this delightful worldly spread is, in fact, a heavenly flower bed. (273)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਅਫਸੋਸ, ਕਿ ਉਸ ਨੇ ਇਸ ਆਉਣ ਜਾਣ ਵਿਚ ਆਪਣਾ ਕੁਝ ਨ ਸਵਾਰਿਆ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: eIx cSim qU ^wnw dwir jwnwnsq [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Whosoever developed a friendship with the devotees of Waaheguru,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਇਹ ਤੇਰੀ ਅੱਖ ਸੱਜਨ ਪਿਆਰੇ ਦਾ ਘਰ ਹੈ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: eIx q^iq vjUid msnid sulqwnsq [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Take it that his shadow (on them) will be many times more blessed than the shadow of the feathers of  the Humaa bird (It is said that a shadow of Humaa bird can bestow the kingdom of the world). (274)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਇਹ ਹਸਤੀ ਦਾ ਤਖਤ ਸੱਚੇ ਪਾਤਿਸ਼ਾਹ ਦਾ ਸੰਘਾਸਨ ਹੈ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: hr bUAlhvsy bsUie aU rwh n burd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: We should take it that getting absorbed in Waaheguru's meditation is to give up self-ego,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਹਿਰਸਾਣ ਹਵਸਾਣ ਦਾ ਹਰ ਬੰਦਾ ਉਸ ਰੱਬ ਤਕ ਨਹੀਣ ਪਹੁੰਚ ਸਕਦਾ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: ik eIx rwh qA¤lik mMzil mrdwnsq [3[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And, not thinking about Him would get us stuck in every other worldly attraction. (275)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਕਿਉਣਕਿ ਇਹ ਰਸਤਾ ਤਾਣ ਰੱਬ ਦੇ ਸੂਰਮੇ ਭਗਤਾਣ ਦਾ ਹੈ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: hr idl ik brwih rwsq jwnwx Sudw Asq [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: To redeem ourselves from our egos is the real emancipation,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਹਰ ਉਹ ਦਿਲ ਜਿਹੜਾ ਸਿੱਧਾ ਹੀ ਪ੍ਰੀਤਮ ਬਣ ਗਿਆ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: qihkIk ibdwx ik AYin jwnwx Sudw Asq [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And, to tie up our minds with Waaheguru's devotion is also real deliverance. (276)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਯਕੀਨ ਜਾਣੋ ਕਿ ਉਹ ਬਿਲਕੁਲ ਪ੍ਰੀਤਮ ਦਾ ਹੀ ਰੂਪ ਬਣ ਗਿਆ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: X¤k z¤rw iz &Yiz rihmqS ^wlI nIsq [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Whosoever has linked and attached his mind to the Almighty,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਇੱਕ ਜ਼ੱਰਾ ਵੀ ਉਸਦੀ ਰਹਿਮਤ ਅਤੇ ਬਖਸ਼ਿਸ਼ ਤੋਣ ਖਾਲੀ ਨਹੀਣ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: n¤kws drUin nkS ipnhwx Sudw Asq [4[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Take it that he has easily leaped over a sky equipped even with nine locks. (277)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਚਿੱਤਰਕਾਰ ਆਪਣੇ ਚਿਤਰਾਣ ਦੇ ਰੰਗਾਣ ਵਿਚ ਹੀ ਲੁਕਅਿਾ ਹੋਇਆ ਹੈ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: eIx Awmdo r&q juz dmy byS nbUd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: The company of such God-attached devotees,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਇਹ ਅਉਣਾ ਜਾਣਾ ਇਕ ਦਮ ਭਰ ਤੋਣ ਵਧ ਨਹੀਣ ਹੁੰਦਾ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: hr jw ik nzr kunym juz ^yS nbUd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Take it that it is the cure-all; however, how can we be fortunate enough to obtain it? (278)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਜਿੱਥੇ ਵੀ ਅਸੀਣ ਨਿਗਾਹ ਦੌੜਾਣਦੇ ਹਾਣ, ਸਿਵਾਇ ਆਪਣੇ ਦੇ ਹੋਰ ਕੋਈ ਨਹੀਣ ਹੁੰਦਾ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: mwx jwinib ZYr cUM Ningwh ibkunym [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Both the faith and the religion are amazed,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਅਸੀਣ ਕਿਸੇ ਦੂਜੇ ਵਲ ਕਿਵੇਣ ਨਜ਼ਰ ਪੱਟ ਕੇ ਵੇਖ ਸਕਦੇ ਹਾਣ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: cUM ZYr qU hIc ksy pso pyS nbUd [5[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And in this amazement beyond limits they are perplexed. (279)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਕਿੳਣ ਜੋ ਤੇਰੇ ਬਿਨਾਣ ਸਾਡੇ ਅੱਗੇ ਪਿੱਛੇ ਕੋਈ ਵੀ ਨਹੀਣ ਹੁੰਦਾ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: hr bMdw kU qwilib mOlw bwSd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Whosoever imbibes such a chaste and divine desire,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਹਰ ਉਸ ਬੰਦੇ ਦਾ, ਜਿਹੜਾ ਰੱਬ ਦਾ ਤਾਲਬ ਹੁੰਦਾ ਹੈ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: dr hr do jhwx ruqbw-AMS aUlw bwSd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: His Guru (teacher) is the master of innate and intrinsic knowledge. (280)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਦੋਹਾਂ ਜਹਾਨਾਂ ਵਿਚ ਉਸ ਦਾ ਮਰਤਬਾ ਸੱਭ ਤੋਂ ਉਚੇਰਾ ਹੁੰਦਾ ਹੈ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: goXw do jhwx rw b-jOey ib-sqwnMd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: God connected noble saints can make your connection with Him,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਗੋਯਾ ਦੋਹਾਣ ਜਹਾਨਾਣ ਨੂੰ ਉਹ ਇੱਕ ਜੌਣ ਦੇ ਬਦਲੇ ਲੈ ਲੈਣਦੇ ਹਨ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: mjnUMin qU kY AwSik lYlw bwSd [6[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: They can also help you to obtain the eternal treasure, the Naam. (281)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਤੇਰਾ ਮਜਨੂੰ ਕਦੋਣ ਲੈਲਾ ਦਾ ਪ੍ਰੇਮੀ ਬਣਦਾ ਹੈ #

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: dr dihr ik mrdwin ^udw Awmdw AMd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: This is an immortal achievement for an enlightened person,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਸੰਸਾਰ ਵਿਚ ਜਦ ਰੱਬ ਦੇ ਭਗਤ ਆਉਣਦੇ ਹਨ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: br Zum-Sudgwin rihnumw Awmdw AMd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: This adage is commonly well known, and everyone is well acquainted with it. (282)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਉਹ ਭੁੱਲੇ ਹੋਇਆਣ ਨੂੰ ਠੀਕ ਰਾਹ ਦੱਸਣ ਲਈ ਆਉਣਦੇ ਹਨ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: goXw Agr eIN cSim qU muSqwik ^udw Asq [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: The enlightened, perfect and submerged into the love of God devotees;

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਗੋਯਾ # ਜੇਕਰ ਤੇਰੀ ਇਹ ਅੱਖ ਰੱਬ ਦੀ ਤਾਣਘ ਵਾਲੀ ਹੋਵੇ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: mrdwin ^udw ^udw-numw Awmdw AMd [7[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: They always have His Naam on their tongues and lips in meditation. (283)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਤਾਣ ਸਮਝ ਕਿ ਰੱਬ ਦੇ ਭਗਤ ਰੱਬ ਨੂੰ ਵਖਾਉਣ ਲਈ ਆਉਣਦੇ ਹਨ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: dr mzhib mw ZYr-prsqI n kunMd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: To continually meditate on His Naam is their worship;

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਸਾਡੇ ਧਰਮ ਵਿਚ ਹੋਰਨਾਣ ਦੀ ਪੂਜਾ ਨਹੀਣ ਕਰਦੇ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: sr qw bkdm bhoS E msqI n kunMd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And, the eternal treasure blessed by Akaalpurakh directs one towards His path. (284)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਉਹ ਇਕ ਹੋਸ਼ ਵਿਚ ਰਹਿੰਦੇ ਹਨ ਅਤੇ ਮਸਤੀ ਨਹੀਣ ਕਰਦੇ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: Zw&il nSvMd Xk dm Az Xwid ^udw [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: When the divine eternal treasure shows Its face,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਉਹ ਇਕ ਦਮ ਲਈ ਵੀ ਰੱਬ ਦੀ ਯਾਦ ਤੋਣ ਗ਼ਾਫ਼ਿਲ ਨਹੀਣ ਰਹਿੰਦੇ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: dIgr su^n Az bulMdo psqI n kunMd [8[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: You would then belong to Waaheguru and He would belong to you. (285)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਨਾਲੇ ਉਹ ਉਚਾਈ ਨਿਚਾਈ ਦੀਆਣ ਗੱਲਾਣ ਨਹੀਣ ਕਰਦੇ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: X¤k z¤rw Agr SOik ielwhI bwSd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: If the shadow of Akaalpurakh falls on someone's heart and soul,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਜੇਕਰ ਰੱਤਾ ਭਰ ਵੀ ਰੱਬ ਦਾ ਸ਼ੌਕ ਹੋਵੇ, ਤਾਣ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: ibhqr ik hzwr bwdSwhI bwSd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Then take it that the painful thorn of separation has been extracted out of the foot (depth) of our mind. (286)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਉਹ ਹਜ਼ਾਰਾਣ ਪਾਤਸ਼ਾਹੀਆਣ ਨਾਲੋਣ ਵੀ ਚੰਗੇਰਾ ਹੈ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: goXw-sq Zulwim murSid ^yS [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: When the thorn of separation has been removed from the feet of the heart,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਗੋਯਾ ਆਪਣੇ ਸਤਿਗੁਰੂ ਦਾ ਬੰਦਾ ਹੈ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: eIx ^q n muhqwij gvwhI bwSd [9[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Take it then that the Akaalpurakh has made the temple of our heart as His abode. (287)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਇਸ ਲਿਖਤ ਲਈ ਕਿਸੇ ਗਵਾਹੀ ਦੀ ਲੋੜ ਨਹੀਣ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: hr ks b-jhw nSvo numw mI ^whd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Like that drop of water that fell into a river or ocean, giving up its own identity (showing humility),

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਹਰ ਮਨੁਖ ਇਸ ਜਹਾਨ ਵਿਚ ਵਧਣਾ ਫੁਲਣਾ ਚਾਹੂੰਦਾ ਹੈ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: Aspo Suqro &Ilo iqlw mI ^whd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: It itself became the river and the ocean; (thus falling on the feet of Aakaalpurakh), and convergence with Him took place. (288)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਉਹ ਘੋੜੇ, ਊਠ, ਹਾਥੀ ਅਤੇ ਸੋਣਾ ਲੋਚਦਾ ਹੈ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: hr ks iz brwie ^yS cIzy mI ^whd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Once the drop merges into the ocean,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਹਰ ਆਦਮੀ ਆਪਣੇ ਲਈ ਕੁਝ ਨ ਕੁਝ ਲੋਚਦਾ ਹੈ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: goXw iz ^udw Xwid ^udw mI ^whd [10[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: After that, it cannot be separated from the ocean. (289)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਪਰੰਤੂ ਗੋਯਾ ਤਾਣ ਰੱਬ ਪਾਸੋਣ ਕੇਵਲ ਰੱਬ ਦੀ ਯਾਦ ਹੀ ਲੋਚਦਾ ਹੈ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: pur gSqw iz sr qw b-kdm nUr-aul-nUr [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: When the drop started to rush in the direction of the ocean,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਸਿਰ ਤੋਣ ਪੈਰਾਣ ਤਕ ਉਹ ਨੂਰ ਨਾਲ ਭਰ ਗਿਆ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: AweInw ik dr vYn bvd hIc ksUr [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: It, then, realized the significance of being just a drop of water. (290)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਉਹ ਸ਼ੀਸ਼ਾ ਜਿਸ ਵਿਚ ਕੋਈ ਤ੍ਰੇੜ ਨਹੀਣ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: qihkIk ibdwx iz Zwi&lwx dUr bvd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: When the drop was bestowed with this eternal meeting,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਯਕੀਨ ਜਾਨ, ਕਿ ਉਹ ਅਣਗਹਿਲਾਣ ਤੋਣ ਦੂਰ ਰਹਿੰਦਾ ਹੈ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: aU dr idil Awir& krdw zhUr [11[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: The reality dawned on it, and its long-cherished desire was fulfilled. (291)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਉਹ ਤਾਣ ਆਰਫ਼ ਦੇ ਦਿਲ ਵਿਚ ਪ੍ਰਗਟ ਹੁੰਦਾ ਹੈ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: eIx aumir igrwx-mwXw ik brbwd Svd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation:
The droplet said, "Even though I am a small drop of water,
I have been able to measure the expanse of this huge ocean." (292)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਇਹ ਬਹੁ-ਮੁੱਲੀ ਉਮਰ ਜਿਹੜੀ ਜ਼ਾਇਆ ਹੋ ਜਾਂਦੀ ਹੈ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: eIx ^wnwie vIrwx b-ich Awbwd Svd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: If the ocean, out of its extreme kindness, would agree to take me in,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਇਹ ਉਜਾੜ ਘਰ ਕਿਵੇਂ ਆਬਾਦ ਹੋ ਸਕਦਾ ਹੈ#

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: qw murSid kwiml nidhd dsq bRhm [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And, it agreed to merge me into itself even beyond its capacity; (293)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਜਦ ਤਕ ਪੂਰਾ ਸਤਿਗੁਰੂ ਸਹਾਇਤਾ ਨਹੀਣ ਕਰਦਾ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: goXw idil ZmgIn qU cUM Swd bvd [12[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And, it rose like a tidal wave out of the span of the ocean,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਗੋਯਾ # ਤੇਰਾ ਗ਼ਮਾਣ ਨਾਲ ਭਰਿਆ ਦਿਲ ਕਿਵੇਣ ਪ੍ਰਸੰਨ ਹੋ ਸਕਦਾ ਹੈ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: idil zwlim b-ksid kuSqin mw-sq [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: It became another wave, and then bowed in reverence to the ocean. (294)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਜ਼ਾਲਮ ਦਾ ਦਿਲ ਸਾਨੂੰ ਮਾਰਨ ਦਾ ਇਰਾਦਾ ਰਖਦਾ ਹੈ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: idil mzlUim mn bsUie ^udw sq [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: In the same manner, every such person who had a confluence with the Almighty,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਮੇਰਾ ਮਜ਼ਲੂਮ ਦਿਲ ਰੱਬ ਵਲ ਆਸ ਲਾਈ ਬੈਠਾ ਹੈ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: aU drIx i&kr qwx bmw ich kund [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Became complete and perfect on the path of meditation. (295)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਉਹ ਇਸ ਫਿਕਰ ਵਿਚ ਹੈ, ਕਿ ਸਾਡੇ ਨਾਲ ਕੀ ਕਰੇ#

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: mw drIx i&kr qw ^udw ich kund [13[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: In reality, a wave and the ocean are one and the same,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਆਸੀਂ ਇਂਸ ਚਿੰਤਾ ਵਿਚ ਹਾਂ, ਕਿ ਰੱਬ ਕੀ ਕਰਦਾ ਹੈ#

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: dr hwisil aumr Awx ich mw Xw&qw eym [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: But still there is a vast difference between them. (296)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਅਸਾਣ ਇਸ ਉਮਰ ਦਾ ਕੀ ਫਲ ਪਰਾਪਤ ਕੀਤਾ ਹੈ#

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: dr hr do-jhwx Xwid ^udw Xw&qw eym [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: I am just a simple wave, while you are an enormously large ocean,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਦੋਹਾਣ ਜਹਾਨਾਣ ਵਿਚ ਖ਼ੁਦਾ ਦੀ ਯਾਦ ਹਾਸਲ ਕੀਤੀ ਹੈ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: eIx hsqIey ^ySqn blw bUd AzIm [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Thus, there is a big difference between you and me like that between the earth and the sky. (297)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਇਹ ਸਾਡੀ ਹਸਤੀ ਤਾਣ ਇਕ ਵਡੀ ਬਲਾ ਸੀ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: Az ^yS guzSqym ^udw Xw&qw eym [14[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: I am nothing; all this (that I am) is only because of your blessings,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਜਦ ਅਸੀਣ ਆਪਣੇ ਆਪ ਨੂੰ ਛਡ ਦਿੱਤਾ, ਅਸਾਣ ਰੱਬ ਨੂੰ ਪਾ ਲਿਆ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: Az ^wik dir qU qUqIAw Xw&qweym [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: I am, too, one wave in Your vast manifest world. (298)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਤੇਰੇ ਦਰਵਾਜ਼ੇ ਦੀ ਧੂੜ ਤੋਣ ਸਾਨੂੰ ਸੁਰਮਾ ਪ੍ਰਾਪਤ ਹੋਇਆ ਹੈ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: kz dOliq Awx nSvo numw Xw&qweym [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: You would need the association with the noble persons,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਜਿਸ ਦੀ ਬਦੌਲਤ ਅਸੀਣ ਵਧੇ ਫੁਲੇ ਹਾਣ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: mw isjdw br rUie ZYr dIgr nBkunym [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: This will be the first and the foremost thing that you will need. (299)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਅਸੀਣ ਕਿਸੇ ਗੈਰ ਅੱਗੇ ਮੱਥਾ ਨਹੀਣ ਟੇਕਦੇ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: dr ^wnwie idl nkiS ^udw Xw&qweym [15[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: That perfect and complete Creator is visible through His own creations,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਸਾਨੂੰ ਤਾਣ ਆਪਣੇ ਦਿਲ ਦੇ ਘਰ ਵਿਚ ਹੀ ਰੱਬ ਦੇ ਨਿਸ਼ਾਨ ਮਿਲ ਗਏ ਹਨ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: goXw ^br Az Xwid ^udw Xw&qweym [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: The Creator, in fact, abides amidst His own Nature and manifestations. (300)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਗੋਯਾ # ਸਾਨੂੰ ਰੱਬ ਦੀ ਯਾਦ ਤੋਣ ਉਸ ਦੀ ਸੋ ਮਿਲਦੀ ਹੈ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: eIx jwim lbw-lb Az kujw Xw&qweym [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: The Creator and His creations are one and the same,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਇਹ ਨਕੋ-ਨੱਕ ਭਰਿਆ ਪਿਆਲਾ ਭਲਾ ਸਾਨੂੰ ਕਿੱਥੋਣ ਪਰਾਪਤ ਹੋਇਆ#

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: juz qwilib h¤k nsIib hr ks n bvd [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: They, the noble persons, renounce all material distractions except the Provident. (301)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਸਿਵਾਇ ਰੱਬ ਦੇ ਤਾਲਬ ਦੇ ਹੋਰ ਕਿਸੇ ਦੀ ਕਿਸਮਤ ਵਿਚ

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: eIx dOliq nwXwb ik mw Xw&qweym [16[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: O my dear friend! Then you should also make a judgement and conclude,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਇਹ ਦੁਰਲਭ ਦੌਲਤ ਨਹੀਣ ਹੁੰਦੀ, ਜਿਹੜੀ ਸਾਨੂੰ ਪਰਾਪਤ ਹੋਈ ਹੈ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: goXw qw kY drIx srwey mwdUAm [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: As to who is God, and who you are, and how to distinguish between the two. (302)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਗੋਯਾ # ਤੂੰ ਕਦ ਤਕ ਇਸ ਨਾਸ਼ਮਾਨ ਸੰਸਾਰ ਵਿਚ ਰਹੇਣਗਾ #

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: gwhy lwzm Svd v gwhy mlzUm [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: If, in your pursuits, you happen to have a meeting with the Akaalpurakh.

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਜਿਹੜਾ ਕਦੀ ਜ਼ਰੂਰੀ ਹੋ ਜਾਣਦਾ ਹੈ ਅਤੇ ਕਦੀ ਨਿਰਧਾਰਤ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: qw kY cU sgwx br ausq^wx jMg kunym [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Then you should not utter any other word except the word of worship and meditation. (303)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਕਦ ਤਕ ਅਸੀਣ ਕੁੱਤਿਆਣ ਵਾਣਗ ਹੱਡੀਆਣ ਉਪਰ ਲੜਦੇ ਰਹਾਣਗੇ #

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: duinAw mwlUAm Aihil duinAw mwlUAm [17[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: All this tangible and non-tangible boons are because of the meditation,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਸਾਨੂੰ ਦੁਨੀਆ ਦਾ ਵੀ ਪਤਾ ਹੈ ਅਤੇ ਦੁਨੀਆਦਾਰਾਣ ਦਾ ਵੀ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: goXw Agr Awx jmwl dIdn dwrI [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Without meditation, this life of ours is only mortification and humiliation. (304)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਗੋਯਾ # ਜੇਕਰ ਤੂੰ ਉਸਦੇ ਜਲਵੇ ਨੂੰ ਵੇਖਣਾ ਚਾਹੁੰਦਾ ਹੈਣ #

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: Az ^ud hvs mYil rmIdn dwrI [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: The Almighty God has also said,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਜੇਕਰ ਤੂੰ ਆਪਣੀ ਹਿਰਸ ਹਵਸ ਤੋਣ ਭੱਜਨ ਦੀ ਇੱਛਾ ਰਖਦਾ ਹੈਣ #

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: zIx dIdw mbIx ik hzwb sq qurw [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation:
Anyone who transformed himself into a man of God is redeemed." (305)
Anyone who proclaimed through his own mouth that he was God,
The Islamic religious law crucified him just like Mansoor. (306)
Inebriated with God is, in fact, to be always in a state of alertness,
Even dreaming while asleep for the knowledgeable is indeed like staying awake. (307)
In reality, a disrespectful faces the consequences (reaps the fruits) of his own actions,
Because, it is the 'respect' and 'civility' that is capable of showing all the direction of the right path. (308)
If you have transformed yourself from head to toe into Akaalpurakh's form,
And, If you have merged into that unparalleled and matchless Waaheguru, (309)
Then you should adopt the path of meditation,
And, become His (favorite) person by holding on to the divine spiritual  passage  of meditation. (310)
One should assume His presence under all circumstances,
Considering Him Omnipresent and Immanent, and also take it that He is capable of seeing everything everywhere. (311)
There is no education except that of respect and civility in the path of God,
It is not prudent for His seeker-devotee to accept anything but His Order. (312)
The seekers of the Divine Spirit are always respectful,
They are also satiated with reverence while remembering Him. (313)
What does an apostate know about the tradition of those noble persons?
The efforts of an atheist to get a glimpse of Akaalpurakh will always be ineffective. (314)
A disrespectful can never find the path leading towards the Divine Spirit;
No strayed person has ever been able to find the path of God and much less to reach Him. (315)
It is reverence that is the guide to the path of Waaheguru;
And, an atheist remains blank from receiving His blessings. (316)
How can an atheist find the way to the Almighty,
Who has been condemned due to the anger of Waaheguru?(317)
If you care to seek the shelter (and agree to function in their shadow) of the noble souls of God,
You will receive teachings and instructions about respectability there. (318)
Coming to this place (of noble persons), even the apostates become capable to teach lessons of reverence,
Here, even extinguished lamps begin to spread light throughout the world. (319)
O Akaalpurakh! Kindly bestow reverence even on the irreverent,
So that they can spend their lives in Your remembrance. (320)
If you can relish the savor (sweet taste) of Waaheguru's remembrance,
Then O good man! You can become immortal. (321)
Consider this body of dirt as permanent for this reason
Because the devotion for Him have established permanently in the fortress of your heart. (322)
The love and elation for Akaalpurakh are the life-line of the soul,
There is a wealth of faith and religion in His memory. (323)
How can the euphoria and elation for Waaheguru abide in every heart,
And, how can He take refuge in the body made up of dirt. (324)
When your fondness for Akaalpurakh supported you,
Then, take it for granted that you will obtain control and have the divine eternal wealth. (325)
The dust of His path is like a collyrium for our eyes and head,
This dust is much more valuable than the crown and the thrones for the enlightened. (326)
This worldly wealth is not ever lasting,
You should accept this according to the verdict of the true devotees of God. (327)
Meditation of Waaheguru is always absolutely essential for you,
And, the discourse about Him makes you steady and immovable forever. (328)
The devotees of Akaalpurakh are intimately connected to the divine knowledge,
And, the achievement of divine knowledge is completely absorbed inside their souls. (329)
The throne of devotion for Akaalpurakh is permanent and indestructible,
Although every peak has a trough. (330)
The marvel of the zest for God's love is eternal and non-destructible,
Wish were it that we can get just one particle of His devotion. (331)
Whosoever is lucky enough to obtain such a particle, he becomes immortal,
In reality, his desire (to meet with Akaalpurakh) is fulfilled. (332)
When he reached the stage of fulfillment,
That particle of the strong desire for His devotion gets seeded into his heart. (333)
The divine nectar oozes out of his every hair,
And the whole world, with his aroma, becomes alive and rises up. (334)
Fortunate is that person who has attained the Provident;
And, who has turned himself away (detached) from every worldly items except the memory of God. (335)
Even while living in worldly guise, he is detached from every materialistic thing,
Like the Entity of God, he maintains a hidden profile. (336)
Outwardly he might be appearing to be in the grip of a fistful of dust,
Inwardly, he is always engaged in talking about the chaste Akaalpurakh and abides with Him. (337)
Outwardly, he might appear to be immersed in love for his child and wife,
In reality, he always abides (in thought and action) with his God. (338)
Outwardly, he might seem to be inclined towards 'desires and greed',
But inwardly, he remains chaste and sacred in the memory of Waaheguru. (339)
Outwardly, he might appear to be paying attention to horses and camels,
But inwardly, he remains detached from the worldly hub-hub and noises. (340)
He might appear to be involved in gold and silver outwardly,
But he is, in fact, master of land and water inwardly. (341)
His intrinsic worth gets revealed slowly and gradually,
In fact, he becomes a casket of fragrance. (342)
His internal and external selves become one and the same,
Both the worlds become followers of his command. (343)
His heart and tongue are completely immersed in Akaalpurkh's remembrance at all times and  for ever,
His tongue becomes his heart, and his heart his tongue. (344)
Those saintly  souls who have converged with God have said clearly,
That persons of God remain comfortable and happy while they are in meditation." (345)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਇਹਨਾਣ ਜ਼ਾਹਰਾਣ ਅੱਖਾਣ ਨਾਲ ਨਾ ਵੇਖ, ਕਿਉਣਕਿ ਇਹ ਤਾਣ ਤੇਰੇ ਲਈ ਰੁਕਾਵਟ ਹਨ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: by-dIdw ibbIx hr Awx ich dIdn dwrI [18[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: The mastery and splendor of our True King, the Waaheguru, is well known,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਤੂੰ ਬਿਨਾਣ ਅੱਖਾਣ ਦੇ ਵੇਖ, ਜੋ ਕੁਝ ਵੀ ਤੂੰ ਵੇਖਣਾ ਚਲਹੁੰਦਾ ਹੈਣ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: mOjUd ^udwsq qU ikrw mI joeI [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: I bow before the pedestrian who is walking on this path. (346)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਰੱਬ ਤਾਣ ਹਰ ਥਾਣ ਮੌਜੂਦ ਹੈ, ਤੂੰ ਕਿਸ ਨੂੰ ਢੂੰਡਦਾ ਹੈਣ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: mksUd ^udwsq qU kujw mI poeI [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: The traveler on this path arrived at his destination,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਰੱਬ ਦਾ ਮੇਲ ਤਾਣ ਤੇਰਾ (ਜ਼ਿੰਦਗੀ) ਦਾ ਮਨੋਰਥ ਹੈ, ਤੂੰ ਕਿਧਰ ਭਟਕਦਾ ਪਿਆ ਹੈਣ #

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: eIx hr do jhwx inSwin dOliq qusq [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And, his heart became familiar with the real purpose and attainment of life. (347)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਇਹ ਦੋਵੇਣ ਜਹਾਨ ਤੇਰੀ ਮਾਲਕੀ ਦੇ ਚਿਂੰਨ੍ਹ ਹਨ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: XwAnI su^n Az zbwin h¤k mI goeI [19[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: Persons of God really need only His meditation,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਅਰਥਾਤ, ਤੂੰ ਆਪਣੇ ਬੋਲ ਰੱਬ ਦੀ ਜ਼ਬਾਨ ਰਾਹੀਣ ਹੀ ਬੋਲਦਾ ਹੈਣ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: Putkl bYNq [
mbr AY bwd ^wkm Az dir dUsq [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And, the cup of the pleasure and elation of meditation continues to overflow for ever. (348)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਐ ਹਵਾ # ਮੇਰੀ ਮਿੱਟੀ ਸੱਜਨ ਦੇ ਦਰਵਾਜ਼ੇ ਤੋਣ ਨ ਉੜਾਈਣ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: duSmnm srznS kund ik hr jweIsq [1[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: The Mastery (of all creations in this world) is befitting and looks elegant only for the true and the chaste Master, the Akaalpurakh;

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਨਹੀਣ ਤਾਣ ਵੈਰੀ ਭੰਡੀ ਕਰੇਗਾ, ਕਿ ਇਹ ਤਾਣ ਹਰ ਥਾਈਣ ਹੈ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: nIsq ZYr Az Awx snm dr prdwie dYro hrm [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And, it is Him alone who has blessed this fistful of dust the gaiety and prosperity. (349)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਉਸ ਪਿਆਰੇ ਤੋਣ ਬਿਨਾਣ ਕਾਅਬੇ ਅਤੇ ਬੁਤਖ਼ਾਨੇ ਵਿਚ ਹੋਰ ਕੋਈ ਨਹੀਣ ਹੈ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: kY bvd AwiqiS do rMg Az ie^qlwi& sMg hw [2[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: The fondness to remember the Waaheguru blessed him with prominence,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਪੱਥਰਾਣ ਦੇ ਭੇਤ ਕਾਰਣ ਅੱਗ ਦੋ ਰੰਗੀ ਕਿਵੇਣ ਹੋ ਸਕਦੀ ਹੈ #

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: Awsmwx isjdw kund pyiS zmIx ik br aU [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And, this tendency also blessed him with honor and eminence and made him familiar with His mysteries. (350)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਆਸਮਾਨ ਧਰਤੀ ਦੇ ਸਾਹਮਣੇ ਇਸ ਲਈ ਮੱਥਾ ਟੇਕਦਾ ਹੈ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: X¤k do n&s Az pYey izkir ^udw ibnSInMd [3[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: This fistful of dust, with the remembrance of Akaalpurakh, became bright and shiny,

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਕਿ ਰੱਬ ਦੇ ਭਗਤ ਇਸ ਉਪਰ ਇਕ ਦੋ ਪਲ ਲਈ ਰੱਬ ਦੇ ਸਿਮਰਨ ਲਈ ਬੈਠਦੇ ਹਨ ।

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: bzyir swieAwie qUbw murwd hw XwbI [

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: And, the fondness to remember Him began to surge like a storm in his heart. (351)

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਕਲਪ ਬ੍ਰਿਛ ਦੀ ਛਾਵੇਣ ਤਾਣ ਤੈਨੂੰ ਦਿਲ ਦੀਆਣ ਮੁਰਾਦਾਣ ਮਿਲਦੀਆਣ ਹਨ,

gurmukhi.Dr. Ganda Singh: bzyr swieAw mrdwin h¤k ^udw XwbI [4[

Pritpal Singh Bindra.translation: May we express our deep devotion for the Omnipotent who from just one drop of water

Dr. Ganda Singh.translation: ਪਰ ਰੱਬ ਦੇ ਬੰਦਿਆਣ ਦੀ ਛਾਣ ਹੇਠ ਤੂੰ ਰੱਬ ਨੂੰ ਪਰਾਪਤ ਕਰ ਲਵੇਣਗਾ ।
